alert.note: Alert for Telfair (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Telfair County through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near China Hill, or 9 miles northeast of Fitzgerald, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Temperance, and China Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
